settings.content: [Barba.js](http://barbajs.org) is a small, flexible and dependency free library that helps you creating fluid and smooth transitions between your website's pages. It helps reducing the delay between your pages, minimizing browser HTTP requests and enhancing your user's web experience.

settings.label: Active Prefetch
settings.info: With barba.js we can start prefetching the new page on the user's mouseover/touchstart on the link. Since there is a 100-300ms delay during the user hover and the click, we can use this time to start prefetching the page. Most of the time this dead time is enough to get the next page ready! Be wise with the prefetching. Do not use it if you have a long list of links.

settings.label: Transition
settings.info: A transition is an animation that is used in the transition of the old page to the new one as soon as a link is clicked.

settings.label: Barba loading background (.gif)
settings.info: The charge animation you will see at the side transition.
